item.title: Walkthrough: BLE CTF
item.description: This CTF has been in my todo list for a good while, finally I had the time to solve it and to publish a walkthrough article on it! The challenge is available at: https://github.com/hackgnar/ble_ctf and is an awesome tool to learn about BLE and get your feet wet. To be fair I expected the CTF to be a bit more security oriented, but I learned way more than I expected, both on BLE technologies and on the tools used to interact with those.
